footer.text: Character Guide • Playstyle: Layla | Update Date: 11/12/2022 | Editor: ~Z~#0009

description:
Layla is predominantly a Shielder first that also mixes in off-field Cryo dmg output via her Skill's Shooting Stars and her Burst. 

Her burst is low cost so keeping it active is easy and its duration/cooldown match her Shield's so you'll know when to swap back to Layla to renew her abilities.
title: Layla | Playstyle
